pageContent: Objective: To evaluate the role of peripheral inflammation (leukocyte differential count, the proinflammatory cytokines IL-beta, TNF-α, IL-6, IL-8, and the inflammatory markers fibrinogen and C-reactive protein [CRP]) in frailty syndrome in patients with prostate cancer (CaP) undergoing antiandrogen therapy (ADT).

metaData.source:
Quality of life in adult survivors of lung, colon and prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8044158/
